L

leadingDigit(int[]) - Static method in class bases.Natural
Returns the index of the first non-zero digit, starting from the right.
leftShift(int) - Method in class bases.Natural
Produces a number whose digits, in this base, are the result of taking the digits of this number and shifting them to the left m positions, writing zeros in the now empty positions.

N

Natural - Class in bases
Represents an immutable, non-negative integer value along with a base in which to print its digits, which we can think of as a pair (base, value).
Natural(int) - Constructor for class bases.Natural
Creates the value (base, 0).
Natural(int, int) - Constructor for class bases.Natural
Creates the value (base, value)
Natural(int, int[]) - Constructor for class bases.Natural
Creates an integer with the given digits in the given base.
